info.title: Azure SQL Database
info.description: Provides read and update functionality for Azure SQL Database geo backup policies.

get.description: Returns a list of geo backup policies.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: geoBackupPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the geo backup policy.

put.description: Updates a database geo backup policy.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: geoBackupPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the geo backup policy.

requestBody.description: The required parameters for creating or updating the geo backup policy.

kind.description: Kind of geo backup policy.  This is metadata used for the Azure portal experience.

value.description: The list of geo backup policies.

GeoBackupPolicyListResult.description: The response to a list geo backup policies request.

state.description: The state of the geo backup policy.

storageType.description: The storage type of the geo backup policy.

GeoBackupPolicyProperties.description: The properties of the geo backup policy.

GeoBackupPolicyNameParameter.description: The name of the geo backup policy.
